attributes.action: all MP`s Should lose all their benefits when convicted of falsely claiming expenses
attributes.additional_details: MP`s that abuse the expenses they claim should receive a deterant sentence as they are no better than the rioters the difference is they dont smash windows to get what they want they use a pen so they are worse than the rioters as they are in positions of very high trust and they also keep calling each other the right honorable (what a joke) and the ones who are caught then go on tv and tell us they have paid the money back should go to jail too.not stay in government and help pass laws to punish people for doing what they have done and got away with. if the rioters said they would put everything back would they not be prosecuted. I dont think so can we have one law for all not one for MP`s and one for the rest of us. stealing is stealing.
